name: Devil's Hand
description:
Use the outcomes of dice rolls to build your hand of ability cards and use them in combat.

For each roll of the dice, choose a movement card, a damage card, a healing card or convert the roll to cash. Activate these cards on your turn to maneuver around the fight, damage enemies in range and regain hit points.  Every three turns you can spend your cash at the shop to buy more effective cards for future use.

Vanquish every bandit in the fight and advance to the next stage.

CONTROLS: Mouse only

NOTE: Please make sure your chrome zoom is set to 100%. The game might render incorrectly on older versions of the browser.
